Installation guide for CPAT (Coding Potential Assessing Tool))

Prerequisite:
   * python2.7
   * numpy
   * If your computer can not connnect to internet, nose>= 0.10.4 and distribute-0.6.10 are also required. 
   * R
   * pip

Install CPAT hosted on PyPI, run:

$ pip install CPAT

Alternatively, you could download CPAT-VERSION.tar.gz (https://sourceforge.net/projects/rna-cpat/files/?source=navbar) first and then run:

$ pip install CPAT-VERSION.tar.gz

Online Manual:

http://rna-cpat.sourceforge.net/

Contact:
Liguo Wang: wangliguo78@gmail.com
Jung Hyun Park: hjpark@bcm.edu
